text: Whole cell lysates were prepared in RIPA buffer ( 10 mM Tris , 150 mM NaCl , 1 % Triton X-100 , 0.5 % NP-40 , 0.5 % deoxycholate , 0.1 % SDS ) , proteins were separated on 4-12 % Bis-Tris NuPAGE gels ( Invitrogen ) , and transferred to PVDF membranes .
Membranes were subsequently blocked with 5 % milk in PBS-T ( 1X PBS , 0.1 % Tween-20 ) , and incubated with primary antibodies overnight .

Affinity purified rabbit anti-mouse SerpinB2 antibodies were prepared after immunization with a purified recombinant <extra_id_0> GST-murine SerpinB2 fusion protein <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> produced in E . coli as in [ 35 ] .

Other antibodies used for western blot assays include : <extra_id_0> C/EBP-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( sc-150 ) ( Santa Cruz Biotechnologies ) , <extra_id_0> glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and alpha / beta tubulin ( Cell Signaling Technology , Inc . ) .
